title: Why undoing the EU's 2035 combustion engine ban spooks some in the auto sector
description: The EU will soon unveil a new plan to curb CO2 emissions in Europe's car sector, likely loosening an all-out 2035 ban of sales of combustion engine cars. But some businesses face more stringent electrification quotas.
content: Europe's auto industry is braced for a major announcement from the EU on December 10, which could see significant changes made to the European Commission's proposed 2035 combustion engine phase-out.… [+6792 chars]
